bookSourceComment:
1.由于网站有验证机制，请将更多设置里的预下载设置为0，不要一次性缓存过多章节
2.需要登录，否则加载不了目录
3.网站如果被墙了，可以自行更换其它可用域名

常见问题解决办法：
1.刷新界面，登录验证
2.换网络换流量换vpn节点
3.清除缓存清除cookie清除web数据

可自行更改源域名：

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
var sid = java.get('sid');
let i = String(book.bookUrl).includes('https:/');
if (i) { sid = String(book.bookUrl).match(/\d{3,}$/);}

cache.deleteMemory('pxcjj'); //仅通过正文打开详情，防错
if (sid == '🇨🇳') {
	let Info=source.getLoginInfoMap();
	let bkn = String(book.name);
	let id = java.hexDecodeToString(result).match(/\d+$/)[0];
	Info['书名'] = '';
	cache.put('pxsid','');
	Info['章节'] = bkn;
	cache.put('pxid',id);
	source.putLoginInfo(JSON.stringify(Info));
	let length = leng(bkn);
		if (length > 18) book.intro= '《'+book.name+'》\n'+ java.get('jianjie');
		
	rr='1';
	}

else {
let url = 'https://app-api.pixiv.net/v2/novel/series?series_id=' + sid;
//修正bookurl
book.bookUrl = `data:;base64,${java.base64Encode(url)},{'type':''}`;

try {

let headers = gethd();
jg = java.connect(url, headers);
rr = jg.body();
if (jg.code() == 400) {
	source.login();
	Packages.java.lang.Thread.sleep(500);
	let headers = gethd();
	rr = java.get(url, headers).body();
	}

} catch(err) {
	rr={};
	java.toast('详情页链接加载失败'+sid);
	}

//设置解析结果
java.setContent(rr);


//更新更新时间
try {
let tm = java.getString('$.novel_series_latest_novel.create_date');
let d = new Date(tm);
d = java.timeFormatUTC(d,'yy/MM/dd',8*60*60*1000);
book.kind = String(book.kind).replace(/\d+\/\d+\/\d+|$/,d).replace('null','');
} catch(err) {java.toast('详情页内容错误');}

//获取书名并净化
let bkn = String(java.getString('$.novel_series_detail.title')).replace(/^《(.+)》$/,'$1');
book.name = bkn.replace(/[(（].{0,9}((?:仙侠|纯爱|后宫|萝莉).?){3,}.{0,9}[)）](?=\s*[一-ꀀ])/,'');

//java.log('┌获取书名\n[99:99.999] └'+book.name);

//获取书名失败
if (book.name == '') {
	//效果，unicode转字符
	// let ee = JSON.stringify(JSON.parse(rr) );
	let txte = java.getString('$..user_message',rr);
	//弹出提示，sid相应序列不存在
	java.longToast('\n未获取到书名\n'+txte);
	} else {
	
	//放入书名
	let Info=source.getLoginInfoMap();
	Info['书名'] = book.name;
	cache.put('pxsid',sid);
	Info['章节'] = '';
	cache.put('pxid','');
	source.putLoginInfo(JSON.stringify(Info));
	
	//同名共存
	if (source.get('gc') == 1) book.name='📘'+book.name;
	}

//补充封面链接
if (book.coverUrl == null) {
	let img = java.getString('$.novel_series_latest_novel.image_urls.large');
	book.coverUrl = img+','+JSON.stringify(imgoptions);
	
//java.log('┌获取封面\n[99:99.999] └'+book.coverUrl);
}

//计算书名长度
let length = leng(String(book.name));
//大于18个全角字符
if (length > 18) length= '《'+String(book.name).replace(/^📘/,'')+'》\n';
else length = '';

let jianjie = java.getString('$.novel_series_detail.caption');
book.intro = length+java.get('jianjie');
java.put('jianjie',jianjie);
java.put('bookr',rr);
}

	rr
</js>

	sid = id;
	if (source.get('gc')=='1') book.name='📘'+book.name;
}
else if (sid=='') {sid='🇨🇳';}
else {
	let jj = java.get('jianjie');
	java.put('jianjie',book.name+'\n'+jj);
}

`data:;base64,${java.base64Encode(rr)},{'type':''}`

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
page=cache.getFromMemory('pxpage');
cache.deleteMemory('pxpage');
if (baseUrl.startsWith('http://127.')) {rr = [{}];}

else {
rr = java.getElement('$.novels');
nurl = java.getString('$.next_url');
if (rr.length<6&&page==1&&nurl!='') {
	//处理不触发下一页且有nurl的情况
	sleep(500);
	rs = java.ajax(nurl);
	java.setContent(rs)
	rrr = java.getElement('$.novels');
	//合并对象函数，可直接用
	rr.addAll(rrr);
	nurl = java.getString('$.next_url');
}

if (nurl == '') {
	java.toast('搜索页到底了');
	source.put('nurls','http://127.0.0.1');
	} else {source.put('nurls',nurl);}

}
rr
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
let sid = java.get('sid');
if (sid == '🇨🇳') {rr=[result];}
else {
	let i = java.get('i');
	if (i==0) {
		java.setContent(java.get('bookr'));
		}
rr = java.getElement('$.novels');
}
rr
</js>
ruleToc.chapterName:
<js>
let sid = java.get('sid');
if (sid == '🇨🇳') {cc=book.name;}
else {
let title = java.getString('$.title');
title = String(title).replace(/[(（].{0,9}((?:仙侠|纯爱|后宫|萝莉).?){3,}.{0,9}[)）](?=\s*[一-ꀀ])/,'');
let bkn=String(book.name).replace(/^📘|[。？！]+$/g,'');
//消除后不剩字则不消除
cc = title.replace(bkn,'♸').replace(/[《【]♸[。？！]*[】》]|♸[。？！]*/,'')||title;
	}
	cc
</js>
ruleToc.chapterUrl:
<js>
let sid = java.get('sid');
if (sid == '🇨🇳') {
		uu=java.hexDecodeToString(result);
		book.putCustomVariable('这是单贴，链接：'+uu);
	}
else {
let id = java.getString('$.id');
uu='https://app-api.pixiv.net/webview/v2/novel?id=' + id
}
uu
</js>

searchUrl:
<js>
let url = 'http://127.0.0.1/';
try {
let urlStr='https://www.pixiv.net';
let aly = new JavaImporter(
Packages.org.jsoup.Jsoup,
Packages.org.jsoup.Connection);
with (aly) {
Jsoup.connect(urlStr)
.timeout(3000)
.ignoreContentType(true)
.followRedirects(false)
.method(Connection.Method.HEAD)
.execute()
	}

if (page == 1) {
cache.putMemory('pxpage',page);
		if (/^\u200b/.test(key)) {
			let uid = cache.getFromMemory('pxuid');
			if (uid=='') java.longToast('\n请刷新书籍');
			else url = 'https://app-api.pixiv.net/v1/user/novels?filter=for_android&user_id=' + uid;}
		else if (key.startsWith('作者@')) {
			let uid = key.slice(3);
			if (!/^\d{3,}$/.test(uid)) java.longToast('\n请输入正确的id');
			else url = 'https://app-api.pixiv.net/v1/user/novels?filter=for_android&user_id='+uid;	}
		else if (/\d{5,}$/.test(key) ) {
			let sid = key.match(/\d+$/)[0];
			java.put('sid',sid);
			if (key.startsWith('作者')) java.longToast('\n请输入正确的搜索格式');
			else url = `data:;base64,${java.base64Encode(sid)},{'type':''}`;}
		else if (key.startsWith('正文@')) {
			url = 'https://app-api.pixiv.net/v1/search/novel?filter=for_android&merge_plain_keyword_results=true&sort=date_desc&search_target=text&word='+key.slice(3);}
		else { url = 'https://app-api.pixiv.net/v1/search/novel?filter=for_android&merge_plain_keyword_results=true&word='+key;}
source.put('nurls','http://127.0.0.1'); //重置储存的下一页

} else {url = source.get('nurls');}

} catch(err) {
err.message.includes('SocketTimeout') ? 
java.longToast('\n当前网络不支持访问pixiv') : 
java.log('lyc-px搜索错误：'+err);}

	url
</js>

bookSourceComment:
1.请使用3.25发布版阅读app
2.由于网站有验证机制，请将更多设置里的预下载设置为0，不要一次性缓存过多章节
3.需要登录，各个域名登录状态相互独立
4.可在登录ui界面查看当前使用域名与登录状态，可切换域名、测试延迟
5.请不要更改源域名，会使已缓存小说丢失
6.可通过登录UI验证
7.防倒卖，请在登录UI界面输入作者名：tlyanyu

ruleContent.content:
<js>
if( String(chapter.baseUrl).indexOf(Get("url")) !== -1 ){
var document = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var limit_box = document.select("div.limit_code_box");
if (limit_box.hasClass("hide")) {
  	document.select("div.line");
} else if( limit_box && ! limit_box.hasClass("hide") ){
        result = "请刷新重试或点开上方章节链接进行验证";
}
}
else{
newUrl = Get("url") + chapter.url;
chapter.baseUrl = newUrl;
html = java.ajax(newUrl);
document = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(html);
limit_box = document.select("div.limit_code_box");
if (limit_box.hasClass("hide")) {
  	document.select("div.line");
} else if( limit_box && ! limit_box.hasClass("hide") ){
        result = "请刷新重试或点开上方章节链接进行验证";
}
}
</js>

<js>
(() => {
	try {
		data = JSON.parse(source.getVariable())
	} catch (err) {
		data = {}
	}
	sessionID = data.sessionID||"";
	if (!sessionID) {
		chars = "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz123456789";
		charsLength = chars.length
		for (i = 0; i < 26; i++) {
			sessionID += chars.charAt(Math.floor(Math.random() * charsLength))
		}
		data.sessionID = sessionID
		source.setVariable(JSON.stringify(data))
	}
	return JSON.stringify({
		"cookie": "PHPSESSID=" + sessionID,
		"User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; CPU iPhone OS 13_3_1 like Mac OS X) AppleWebKit/605.1.15 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/13.0.5 Mobile/15E148 Snapchat/10.77.5.59 (like Safari/604.1)"
	})
})()
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
if(baseUrl.match(/premier/)){
	result=java.getString(".read-content@html")
	}else{
		toc=java.getElements('.chaw_c li a')
		urls=[]
		toc.forEach(c=>{
			url="https://www.onsitemanagementllc.com"+String(c.attr("href"))
			if(!urls.includes(url)){
				urls.push(url)
				}
			})
		results=java.ajaxAll(urls)
		txt=""
		results.forEach(r=>{
			r=r.body()
			txt+=java.getString(".read-content@html",r)
			})
			result=txt
		}
result
</js>

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]
if(page!="1"){
	java.toast(`当前第${page}页`)
	}
result
</js>
#nr
ruleSearch.name: h3@a@text##《|》.*

ruleToc.chapterList:
-<js>
result=java.getElements(`#nr:has(h3 a:matches(${book.name}))`)
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]
if(result.length==1&&page=="1"){
	uri=result[0].select("h3 a").attr("href")
	toc=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(java.ajax("https://www.onsitemanagementllc.com"+uri))
	result=toc.select(".chaw_c li")
	result.sort((a,b)=>String(b).localeCompare(String(a)))
	java.log(result)
	}
result
</js>

bookSourceComment: // Error: timeout 增加自动验证，不行就手动登录，登录url要与源url一致。 解决目前新的字体格式文字显示的问题(例替换显示为'的')。 by812@221012 解决目前所见到的所有问题，包括页面解析、分页有的页面获取不到、图片转文字等问题，并对内容中出现的翻页断行、以前流行的35字换行排版、部分内容显示HTML源码、推广文字、广告等进行了恢复与过滤。 效果自认为是不错的，就是慢，巨慢，分页多的章节可能获取文字就要几分钟，毕竟，要做过滤和处理。 凑合用吧兄弟们，后续暂时不准备修改了。 地址发布页(浏览器打开) https://zozozo.xyz/ http://www.diyibanzhu666.xyz 目前可用地址： https://www.7yydstxt426.com/ https://www.7yydstxt226.com/ https://www.7yydstxt434.com/ https://www.8yydstxt234.com/ https://6yydstxt178.com/ 获取最新可用网址 大家可以根据自己的网络情况选一个最快的来用 替换👉源域名👈链接即可 注意版主一系各站点数据库并非完全同步，所以换了地址之后原有的小说如果追更就需要重新搜索。 建议用复制出来源换个名称再批量改源的方式来做。

*参数参考
category=分类
orderType=排序0相关性1上架时间3收听量4收藏量5评分
excludeTags=屏蔽标签
includeTags=标签
finished=0连载1完结
source=1原创首发2会员上传
*若要使用自己账号，请用浏览器打开UAA官网(https://www.uaa.com)登录，推荐使用Reqable软件抓包自己账号的token，把本源的↓请求头↓的token换掉即可。

bookSourceComment:
By_聆听月与悦-2025 . 3.22-15:33:41

*在上一次的基础上修改了换源逻辑，更方便了
*书源支持修改书籍变量来实现与网站相同的换源功能，详细请看书籍详情页
*书籍变量≤c

250101新增番茄来源
250203新增七猫来源
250204新增得间来源
250204新增QQ来源(仅支持免费小说)
250204新增熊猫看书
250210更新日志：
1.采用全新验证方式，之后未填写密钥，可以在阅读页登陆后刷新阅读页面即可！
2.搜索默认改为全局搜索，目前仅支持番茄，七猫，QQ，得间，熊猫，后面的按钮是预设，后期会添加相关来源
3.新增大灰狼书架功能，在登陆里面点击书架查看

下个版本预计更新内容：
1.预计发现页新增阅读记录和大灰狼书架栏目
2.预计新增阅读记录，阅读过的书籍可在大灰狼书架-阅读历史中查看
3.预计新增塔读小说，米读小说，小米阅读，猫眼看书，部分起点

ruleSearch.lastChapter:
<js>
function fq_last() {
	let url = `https://api5-normal-sinfonlineb.fqnovel.com/reading/bookapi/multi-detail/v/?aid=1967&iid=1&version_code=999&book_id={{$.book_id}}`;
        let last =JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).data[0]; 
        return last["last_chapter_title"]+" · "+java.timeFormat(last["last_chapter_update_time"]*1000);
	
	}

	
function qm_last() {
	let headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
	sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'

params={'id':{{$.book_id}}, 'imei_ip':'2937357107','teeny_mode':0}

var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {  
  if(param==null) return '';  
  var paramStr = '';  
  var t = typeof (param);  
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {  
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);  
  } else {  
    for (var i in param) {  
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);  
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);  
    }  
  }  
  return paramStr;  
};
paramSign=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key));
headerSign=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))
params['sign']=paramSign;
headers['sign']=headerSign;
let url = "https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/book/detail?"+urlEncode(params);
option = {'headers':headers};
let last =JSON.parse(java.ajax(url+','+JSON.stringify(option)))["data"]["book"];
let last2 =  `${last["latest_chapter_title"]} · ${java.timeFormat(last['update_time']*1000)} `
	return last2
	}
	
if ('{{$.source}}'=='番茄'){
	'番茄:'+fq_last();
	} else if ('{{$.source}}'=='七猫'){
	'七猫:'+qm_last();
	} else {
		'{{$.source}}'
		}

</js>

<js>
match=result.match(/d\(".+"[^"]+".+"\)/)
function d(a, b){
	b = java.md5Encode(b)
	iv = b.substring(0, 16)
	key = b.substring(16)
	Cipher=java.createSymmetricCrypto("AES/CBC/PKCS7Padding" ,key,iv)
	return Cipher.decryptStr(a)}
eval(match[0])
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
temp=result
R=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(temp).select(".BCsectionTwo-top-chapter a")
c=[]
R.forEach(r=>{
	i=String(r.attr('href')).replace(/.+\/\d+\/(\d+)\.html/,`$1`)
	//java.log(i)
	c.push({
		name:r.text(),
		url:r.attr('href'),
		index:i
		})
	})
try{
	o=temp.match(/originalOrder[^=]*=[^\[]*\[([^\]]+)\]/)[1]
	o=o.split(",")
	c.sort((a,b)=>o[c.indexOf(a)]-o[c.indexOf(b)])
	}catch (err){
		java.log(err)
		c.sort((a,b)=>a.index-b.index)
		}
	result=c
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
let html = result;
let jsUrl = html.match(/<script[^>]+src="(https:\/\/js\.8xsk\.org\/[^"]+)"/)?.[1];

let jsCode = java.ajax(jsUrl);

let raw = jsCode.match(/document\.write\((.+?)\);/)?.[1];

if (!raw) {
  result = "未找到正文内容";
} else {
  raw = raw.replace(/^['"]|['"]$/g, "");  // 去掉引号

  let text;
  try {
    text = decodeURIComponent(unescape(raw));  // 解码中文
  } catch (e) {
    text = raw;
  }

  // 清洗 HTML 标签
  text = text.replace(/<br\s*\/?>/gi, "\n").replace(/<[^>]+>/g, "");

  result = text.trim();  // 设置 result 为正文
}
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
match=result.match(/d\(".+"[^"]+".+"\)/)
function d(a, b){
	b = java.md5Encode(b)
	iv = b.substring(0, 16)
	key = b.substring(16)
	Cipher=java.createSymmetricCrypto("AES/CBC/PKCS7Padding" ,key,iv)
	return Cipher.decryptStr(a)}
eval(match[0])
</js>

<js>
let bkurl=surl();
book.bookUrl=String(book.bookUrl).replace(/^https:\/\/[^\/]+/, bkurl);
let hj=java.get('sshj');
if (hj=='') {
let tags=String.raw`{{@@.addtags>a:not(:last-of-type)@text##\n## #}}`;
tags=tags ? ('#'+tags+'\n') : '';
let jj=tags+java.get('jianjie')+`
{{@@.addtags~p@textNodes##`##\\`}}`.replace(/簡介：/,'');
result={
	jj:jj};

} else {
	let st=gets('.info@text');
	let sj=st.match(/创建于([\d\ \-\:]+)/)[1];
	let fm=gets('#classify_container li img.0@src');
	fm+=`,{headers:{referer:'${surl()}/'}}`;
	result={
	tags:sj,
	fm:fm};

}
</js>

ruleSearch.bookList:
let [key,page] = java.hexDecodeToString(result).split('🀄'); let url=surl(); if (key.startsWith('@')) { key=key.slice(1); java.put('sshj',key); url += '/q/?q='+key+'&m=&f=_all&s=create_time_DESC&p=1';} else if (/^[#＃]/.test(key)) { let webua=java.getWebViewUA(); key=key.slice(1); url += `/albums-index-page-${page}-tag-${key}.html,{headers:{User-Agent:"${webua}"}}`;} else if (/^■\d/.test(key)) { java.put('cos',1); let page2=((source.getLoginInfoMap()||{})['发现起始页数']||'1')+[]||'1'; //兼容null和java"" page=+page + +page2 - 1; if (page>3&&(page&1)==0&&page2>2) java.toast('第'+page+'页'); let webua=java.getWebViewUA(); key=key.slice(1); url += `/albums-index${page==1?'':('-page-'+page)}-cate-${key}.html,{headers:{User-Agent:"${webua}"}}`;} else { url+='/q/?q='+key+'&m=&f=_all&s=create_time_DESC&p='+page;} let webr=java.ajax(url); java.setContent(webr); result=java.getElement('#classify_container li'); let hj=java.get('sshj'); if (hj!=''&&result.length>1) { let st=java.getString('.info@text',result); let sj=st.match(/创建于([\d\ \-\:]+)/)[1]; let sl=st.match(/\d+(?=张图)/g); sl=sl.reduce((acc, cur)=>acc+Number(cur),0); let im=java.getString('img.0@all',result); let rr=`
  • ${sl}张图${sj}
    • +${im}`; result=[rr]; } else {java.put('sshj',''); result;}
ruleSearch.bookUrl:
<js>
let hj=java.get('sshj');
let url;
if (hj=='') url= surl()+java.getString('a@href');
else url=java.getString('a@href');
</js>
ruleSearch.intro:
<js>
let hj=java.get('sshj');
if (hj=='') {
	let rr=String(java.getString('a@text'));
	let nm = rr.match(/\[([^\[\]]+)\]\-?\s*([^\[\]]+)(?:(\[[^\[\]]+\])\s*)(?:(\[[^\[\]]+\])\s*)?/);
	if (nm) {result=nm[3]+(nm[4]?nm[4]:'');java.put('jianjie',result);}
	else result='';
	}
</js>
ruleSearch.kind:
<js>
	let rr = '{{@@li@class##cate-}}';
	let tt = `{{@@.info@text##([\d\-\s\:]{4,})$##$1###}}`;
	result=rr ? (flfl[rr][0]+','+tt) : tt;
</js>
ruleSearch.name:
<js>
let hj=java.get('sshj');
let cos=java.get('cos');

if (hj=='') {
	let rr=String(java.getString('a@text'));
	let nm = rr.match(/\[([^\[\]]+)\]\-?\s*([^\[\]]+)/);
	if(!nm&&cos==1) nm=rr.match(/(^.+)\s+[–\-]\s+(.+$)/);
	if (nm&&!/^3d$/i.test(nm[1])) {java.put('anm',nm[1]); result=nm[2];}
	else {java.put('anm',rr); result=rr;}
	}
else {java.put('anm','合集'); result='📚'+hj;}

result
</js>

ruleToc.nextTocUrl:
<js>
let hj=java.get('sshj');
if (hj=='') {result=[];}
else {
result=gets('.block-pagination a@href').split('\n');
result.push("data:;base64,aHR0,{'type':'ss'}");
}
result
</js>

var fullUrl = `${baseUrl}/authors/${java.encodeURI(letter)}.html`;
var full_Url = `${baseUrl}`;

if (fullUrl.match(/closed/)) {
    push("👤 作者索引—已关闭", "", 1);  
    java.toast("\n🌐【 " + full_Url + " 】\n🏷️ 标签选择——已关闭");
} else {
    push("👤 作者索引—" + letter, "", 1);
    java.toast("\n🌐【 " + fullUrl + " 】\n🏷️ 标签选择——" + letter);
}

try {
    if (!fullUrl.match(/closed/)) {
        var doc = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(java.ajax(fullUrl));
        var authors = doc.select(".authorsbox ul:nth-of-type(2) li a");    
        for (var i = 0; i < authors.size(); i++) {
            var link = authors.get(i);
            var href = link.attr("href");       
            if (href.startsWith("http")) {
            } else if (href.startsWith('/')) {
                href = baseUrl + href;
            } else {
                href = baseUrl + '/' + href;
            }       
            push(link.text(), href, 0.25);
        }
        java.toast("\n🔍 作者数量—— " + authors.size());
    }
} catch (error) {
    java.toast("\n⚠️获取标签失败: " + error);
}

JSON.stringify(result);
</js>
header:
<js>
(() => {
	try {
		data = JSON.parse(source.getVariable())
	} catch (err) {
		data = {}
	}
	sessionID = data.sessionID||"";
	if (!sessionID) {
		chars = "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz123456789";
		charsLength = chars.length
		for (i = 0; i < 26; i++) {
			sessionID += chars.charAt(Math.floor(Math.random() * charsLength))
		}
		data.sessionID = sessionID
		source.setVariable(JSON.stringify(data))
	}
	return JSON.stringify({
		"cookie": "PHPSESSID=" + sessionID,
		"User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; CPU iPhone OS 13_3_1 like Mac OS X) AppleWebKit/605.1.15 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/13.0.5 Mobile/15E148 Snapchat/10.77.5.59 (like Safari/604.1)"
	})
})()
</js>

ruleBookInfo.intro:
<js>
var part1 = java.getString("h1@text");

var part2 = String(java.getString('//p[@class="info"]/text()[1]')).replace('作者：', '').trim();

var part3 = String(java.getString('.right@span@text')).replace(/\../, '');

var part4 = String(java.getString('//p[@class="info"]/text()[2]')).replace('类型：', '').trim();

var part5_raw = String(java.getString('//p[@class="info"]/text()[3]')).replace('字数：', '').trim();
var word = parseInt(part5_raw);
var part5;
if (word >= 10000) {
    part5 = (word / 10000).toFixed(2) + '万';
} else if (word >= 1000) {
    part5 = (word / 1000).toFixed(1) + '千';
} else {
    part5 = word + '字';
}

var part6_raw = String(java.getString('//p[@class="info"]/text()[4]')).replace('人气：', '').trim();
var popularity = parseInt(part6_raw);
var part6;
if (popularity >= 10000) {
    part6 = (popularity / 10000).toFixed(2) + '万';
} else if (popularity >= 1000) {
    part6 = (popularity / 1000).toFixed(1) + '千';
} else {
    part6 = popularity;
}

var part7 = java.getString('.chapter-list.0@li.0@text');

var part8 = java.getString('.bd.2@tag.div.0@text');
var result = " \n" + 
	   '⚠️ 禁传播、倒卖等；禁下小说'+ '\n'+
    '📕 书名：' + part1 + '\n' +
